{{Description|Legend has it that in the past, this sacred forest was once home to many demons. To this day, the legend of the "tanuki-bayashi" still surrounds this tranquil woodland.|[[Archive]]}}
{{Location Intro|{{Lang|'''Chinju Forest'''|ja=鎮守の森|ja_rm=Chinshu no Mori}}|description=<p>Chinju Forest is a unique location in [[Teyvat]], as it always appears to be in an eternal night. The sun doesn't rise or set in Chinju Forest for an unknown reason.</p>}}

==Trivia==
* During the [[Version 2.0]] Special Program, it was referred to as the Shugo Forest {{Lang|ja=守られた森|ja_rm=Mamorareta Mori|zh=守护之森|zh_rm=Shǒuhù zhī Sēn}} in the captions. Shugo is the onyomi reading of the Chinese word {{Lang|mini=1|zh=守护|zh_rm=Shǒuhù}} meaning "guardian" or "protection."
